text: Trying to create an email subscription custom module with some featured image and custom text along with global module of email subscription.

It gives me an error : Error:Cannot resolve property "module"
2.
Error:1:9'module' is disabled in this context
After searching on google and other resources , I came to know that we cannot use Global modules in our custom module
Is that correct ? or if it is not possible then what are the alternative ways to do it in my case ?
do it need to create another custom module for email subscription ?
or I have to just drag and drop first the image module ,then text module , and then email module.
and combine them together to create a group module
is that the only approach to do? or any alternative approach available
<@UJWH1GTNH> you can't nest a Custom module in another module. You would have to combine them into one.
<@UATE4ATHP> yes, I did by that way.
